text.0:
Of Cytherea, born in Cyprus , I will sing. 
 She gives kindly gifts to men: smiles are ever on her lovely face, and lovely is the brightness that plays over it.
 Hail, goddess, queen of well-built Salamis
text.1:
and sea-girt Cyprus ; grant me a cheerful song. 
 And now I will remember you and another song also.

edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator
author: homeric hymns
